insert into order_detail (name, image, order_id, dish_id, setmeal_id, dish_flavor, number, amount) values
(#{od.name}, #{od.image}, #{od.orderId}, #{od.dishId}, #{od.setmealId}, #{od.dishFlavor}, #{od.number}, #{od.amount})
mapper.select: select coalesce(d.name, s.name) from order_detail od left join dish d on od.dish_id = d.id left join setmeal s on od.setmeal_id = s.id where od.order_id = #{orderId}
